title: FS: Huge Lot of Lower Grade T206 HOF'ers
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Huge Lot of Lower Grade T206 HOF'ers
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 HOF cards for sale. These are mostly lower grade cards, as the scans will show, but there are some nicer mid-grade cards as well.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

*ALL REMAINING CARDS CONSOLIDATED INTO UPDATED LISTING*

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=2467747[/url]

Marc I would offer 225 shipped on the Lajoie Throwing PSA 1- if not I understand but thanks for considering

Ed
